maml:description.maml:para: Adds one or more members to an Computer group.

dev:remarks.maml:para: "luj added in Remote Desktop Users at C12345678." This example shows how to call the Add-LocalGroupMember function with named parameters.
'joan added in Administrators at $env:COMPUTERNAME' This example shows how to call the Add-LocalGroupMember function with positional parameters.
'joan added in Administrators at c012345' This example shows how to call the Add-LocalGroupMember function with positional parameters.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates new local User.
Creates new local User on the specified computer.
Username of the new User to be created
Specifies where to create the User, per Default is the localmachine.
A description of the DisplayName parameter.
A description of the Description parameter.
A description of the Password parameter.

A description of the CannotChangePassword parameter.

Adds one or more members to an Computer group.
A detailed description of the Get-LocalGroup function.
A description of the GroupName parameter.
The description of a the ComputerName parameter.
A description of the GroupName parameter.
The description of a the ComputerName parameter.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 0 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Get-LocalGroup "Remote Desktop Users" C12345678

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example shows a list of Users in the "Remote Desktop Users" Group on C12345678 computer.
This example shows a list of Users in the Administrators Group on the local computer.

maml:description.maml:para: Get a list of groups where the member.
Get-LocalGroupMember list all the local groups from a given computer where the user belongs.
The ComputerName where the command will be done, if no ComputerName is given the current computer will be taken instead.
A description of the GroupName parameter.
The ComputerName where the command will be done, if no ComputerName is given the current computer will be taken instead.
A description of the GroupName parameter.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 0 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Get-LocalGroupMember "Remote Desktop Users" C12345678

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example shows a list of Users in the "Remote Desktop Users" Group on C12345678 computer.
This example shows a list of Users in the Administrators Group on the local computer.

maml:description.maml:para: Remove a member from a Computer group.
A detailed description of the Remove-LocalGroupMember function.
UserName in the domain.
Group name of the group where the user need to be removed. If no GroupName is given "Remote Desktop Users" will be taken.
Computer Name where it will be applied. If no ComputerName is given, local Computer will take instead.
UserName in the domain.
Group name of the group where the user need to be removed. If no GroupName is given "Remote Desktop Users" will be taken.
Computer Name where it will be applied. If no ComputerName is given, local Computer will take instead.

dev:remarks.maml:para: "luj deleted in Remote Desktop Users at C12345678." This example shows how to call the Remove-LocalGroupMember function with named parameters.
'joan added in Administrators at $env:COMPUTERNAME' This example shows how to call the Remove-LocalGroupMember function with positional parameters.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 0 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Set-BackgroundDesktop -SourceImage C:\temp\legolotr.jpg -UserName h3d -ComputerName C020794

maml:description.maml:para: Change the Logon Background.
Change the Logon Background from a Computer. If no Computer is defined it will change the current computer Logon Background
A description of the SourceImage parameter.
A description of the ComputerName parameter.
A description of the SourceImage parameter.
A description of the ComputerName parameter.
Modify the Size of an Image
If you have an image and want just change his JPEG Compression till it reaches a Maximum size. It was designed to fit the needs of the Logon Background for Windows 7.
Image to change
Default will be the size of Logon background default 250Kb.
Where to save the Image
Image to change
Default will be the size of Logon background default 250Kb.
